content.rendered:
beauty bar in fredericton | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in fredericton, new brunswick. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in fredericton | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 343 queen street, suite 101A
  • 506-454-1717
  • fredericton@thetenspot.com

  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon. - tue: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

wed. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat. - sun: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I went in for a Brazilian wax. Amazing service and quality! The tech was super nice and made me feel super comfortable. Zero complaints about the quality of her work.However, they made me wait close to 30 min after my appointment time. I was there for an hour instead of "20 min service".I'll be back, but the scheduling situation needs a lot of improvement.
KARIME CHALITA
1722595724
Beautiful space, great service with Amanda today, I will definitely be back. Felt like a positive environment right away when coming thru the door, the service was above and beyond with thoughtful extra touches. Thanks Amanada
hillary christie
1720911016
Wonderful experience overall. Warm and welcoming. Emma does amazing work and effortlessly understood exactly what I was looking for!
Tiffany
1720827407
I had a pedicure and brazilly done! Ten spot is always so professional and pleasant to go and see. I’ve gone back multiple times and especially for the brazilly the estheticians are detail orientated and do a great job!
Kyra Thomson
1720719755
Savanah did a pedi for me and she did a FANTASTIC job. She has such excellent customer service, she’s polite and kind, and very easy to chat with. Not only did Savanah do a wonderful job, but the receptionist, Maria, she was such a delight! She made sure to greet me, offered me beverages. What exceptional service. 🥰Not only is the service amazing, but the atmosphere of this spa is phenomenal! I’m honestly blown away with how sweet everyone is! It truly is a welcoming experience and I’m looking forward to booking more services in the future 💕
Holly Pond
1715564443
My first visit today, for a gel pedi. Savanna was excellent, very easy to talk to and very good at her job! She was considerate and careful, I have mobility issues and she worked around them with no problems at all. The time went by fast, I thoroughly enjoyed my service, love my ice blue sparkly nails, and will definitely be back!
Kate Warren
1714260212
Loved this place! Will definitely be back! A really lovely community of workers that make the experience feel like you’re hanging with friends!! Not to mention I got red on both hands and toes and it was applied perfectly by Herman!!!
sophie fogelman
1711061475
Second time going for a gel mani with Harman - this time going for french tips and heart embellishments and am seriously in love with the finished set! Such a wonderful atmosphere and lovely staff who make you feel welcome the minute you step into the door, couldn't recommend the Ten Spot enough.
Tabi Evans
1709433178
Surprised my wife with a couples gel pedicure, we had a great experience. We were treated with the utmost care and had a lot of fun! All the workers were excellent, funny and very professional! Would absolutely recommend!
Josh Shortall
1707680521
I finally made it to The Ten Spot for a service and am so glad I did. I enjoy the atmosphere -- the sountrack and vibe is more energetic, less Enya -- and Marzi was great. She gave me a recommendation that was different than what I'd booked based on the condition of my nails and what I'd stated as my needs. I'd just shed the last of my last shellac so my nails were flimsy and awful-looking, and I needed strong nails to be able to set up a tradeshow booth solo within the week after. The overlay was just what I needed, and I love the colour I picked. Though I'd dinged the side of my thumbnail in the LED light tray and we both missed it, and the shaping on 1 nail was a little uneven, overall it was a great experience! Maria was great with her service as well, and Mika bringing her sweet dog Bella in was the icing on the cake. Thanks, all! I'll be back 🙂
Brenda Perrin
1706474367
Such a great place! So friendly and nice! Treated myself and my daughter like queens! We will be back!Edit- came back to get my brows and lashes tinted! 10/10 amazing! Maddie did an amazing job. Already rebooked!
Jess DeAdder
1705097098
Loved it! My gel mani turned out perfectly, the nail tech was very helpful in suggesting colors that would go together.
Kimberley Wheaton
1702001799
Had the full pedi done by Madison, loved it! She was super sweet and recommended a nice color pattern.The products used felt clean and natural and my toes look great.It was a really fun and welcoming environment and I'll definitely be going back.
Eleanor Waite
1701556544
Officially my new favourite spa place on Fredericton! The staff were all so kind and the service was exceptional!! Waxing was super quick and as close to painless as possible, and my gel nails turned out better than I could have imagined!!
Amy Soucy
1690567870
‹
›
